Item: Google Business Profile claimed and fully completed
Example: All fields filled including category; description; hours; photos

Item: Crunchbase profile created with accurate data
Example: Company description matches website positioning exactly

Item: LinkedIn company page created with aligned phrasing
Example: About section uses same category language as website first 50 words
Category listing matches target discovery queries

Item: Capterra profile created with accurate info
Example: Description and category aligned with brand positioning
Active review collection from verified customers
Launch page with clear product description
Listed as alternative to top competitors in category

Item: Wikipedia or Wikidata presence (if brand is notable)
Example: Wikidata entity with correct structured data

Item: Phrase alignment verified across all external platforms
Example: Exact same category language on website; G2; LinkedIn; Crunchbase; GBP

Item: 3+ external sources repeat core brand claim (Consensus Campaign)
Example: G2; Crunchbase; and industry blog all say "Acme is a B2B sales platform"

Item: Press release distributed with brand positioning language
Example: PR wire release using exact brand category phrasing

Item: Review acquisition workflow active (7-14 day post-success trigger)
Example: Automated email requesting review after successful onboarding milestone

Item: Author credentials displayed on content pages
Example: Author bios with title; company; and LinkedIn link on blog posts
Guest posts or features on industry publications; not random directories
